add.title: Add New Word

import.title: Import Vocabulary
import.dropZone: Click to select file or drag and drop
import.txtFormat: TXT: One English word per line
import.csvFormat: CSV: First column should contain English words

empty.title: Start Your Learning Journey
empty.description: No vocabulary added yet. Select words in conversations or use the import feature to start building your personal vocabulary collection.

grammar.title: Grammar Center
grammar.description: Learn English grammar with interactive exercises

presentPerfect.title: Present Perfect
presentPerfect.description: Use the present perfect to talk about actions that started in the past and continue to the present.
presentPerfect.example: I have lived in London for five years.

simplePast.title: Simple Past
simplePast.description: Use the simple past to talk about completed actions in the past.
